text: bit random but wondering if anyone has found a way to force a particular language variation of a global partial?

Hello <@U05ELH23S4A>,
After looking on our side we are not using HubSpot forms in our website for user creation. For that reason we are creating the contact manually from our backend on user subscription.
As we still have the pixel on our website is there a way for us to transmit the GCLID to HubSpot via the Pixel without using an HubSpot form ?
If not is it possible to do it from our backend when sending the conversion to HubSpot and again without using HubSpot forms ?
Thanks in advance for your answer,
Hi! I am trying to add a google font to my newsletters. I have added the import code and inline style to the body. But it doesn't work. Anyone that had a success in this area?
@laroslav Thank you so much for your help. And clear the doubt.
<@U03CCF7C1NX> I'm sorry, but I'm not a HubSpot developer, I'm a user and trying to find answers to the question for myself :)
Are you an Super Admin in your HubSpot portal?  If not that may be what the issue is.  I believe installing the integration requires a Super Admin account.

hey all - I'm trying to publish an app, I've filled out all the fields but I still get this one field that shows up as not filled out. Literally all the fields under this section are done. Any ideas what's causing it?

Does anyone know if itâ€™s possible to generate a unique QR code within HubSpot (out of the box, I.e without using something on marketplace) for each individual user. 

Trying to create an event check in process, I want to create and assign each user their own QR (made up of data from their profile), that I can scan at an event to identify who is being checked in.  (Trying to avoid using an external QR generator)

Tried using JS directly in HubSpot but the mail clients strip that out. Anyone else got any suggestions? 

Thanks in advance.
ok thanks <@U01GW2U4WMA>
Anyone ever have issues with adding a new domain and the site showing the blog page as the homepage?

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
is there a way to add a message to the editor sidebar of a template, global section or custom-section?
something like in the modules

I hope you are doing well.
I would like some help creating a forum website using HubSpot, as outlined in the following article: <https://blog.HubSpot.com/service/how-to-create-a-forum-website|How to Create a Forum Website>. Specifically, I would like to understand the process of setting this up in HubSpot, including how data will be displayed on the actual page and the source of the data.
Any detailed guidance or resources you can provide on this would be greatly appreciated.

Hey, I'm trying to get my verification working on my backend receiving HubSpot webhook subscriptions. I am trying to validate the request using the encryption methods mentioned here and it appears as though my local tests are not able to verify example requests I've made:

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/webhooks/validating-requests>

Can anyone assist me with this?

you would need to use an external service to generate the URL. If you have OPS pro you could use a custom code action in a workflow to generate one then save it to a contact or object.

Example of a service here:
<https://goqr.me/api/doc/create-qr-code/>
It means no homepage has been assigned for that domain. It'll default to the blog listing instead. Just go find your homepage and leave the url slug blank and publish

as far as I can tell, that's not a guide for HubSpot. It's a guide BY HubSpot on how to make a forum website.

Theoretically you could make a small one using hubdbs or custom objects, but you'd hit the cap on the number of records available on this very very quickly
what have you tried? Generally I just use <https://webhook.site/> and then check if my logic matches the validation
It already is blank
huh did you connect your domain before you published the homepage?
because if that's the case then it's probably cached and it'll take a little while for it to update to the correct page
